summary: A group of aspiring young actors wait tables at a New York City restaurant.
cast: Will Arnett|Debbon Ayer|Dwight Ewell|Eddie Malavarca|Terumi Matthews|Michael Raynor|Daniel Riordan|Taylor Stanley|Donald Williams|Alice Spivak|Vinnie Platania|Christopher Lawford|Amy Marcs|Leslie Lyles|Howard Spiegel|Pam Wilterdink|Scott Wojcik|Harvey Waldman|John McKay|Christopher Gaida
title: The Waiting Game
